monster.name: Knight of the Order
languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The knight regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the knight takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the knight's next turn. The knight's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the knight's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a {@spell wish} spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The knight is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Oath ( <input type = "checkbox">/day)
entries: The knight can cast any paladin spell of 1st level. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (Save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks}.

<details>{@spell bless}, {@spell ceremony|XGE}, {@spell command}, {@spell compelled duel}, {@spell cure wounds}, {@spell detect evil and good}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell detect poison and disease}, {@spell divine favor}, {@spell heroism}, {@spell protection from evil and good}, {@spell purify food and drink}, {@spell searing smite}, {@spell shield of faith}, {@spell thunderous smite}, {@spell wrathful smite}</details>

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two longsword attacks or two fist attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the knight can grapple the target (escape {@dc 14}) provided the target is Large or smaller.
